```tsx
import { Palette, ColorPicker } from "@fold-ui/core";
```

### Picker

> The Color Picker component enable users to choose their desired color visually, eliminating the need for them to be familiar with the exact HEX, RGB, or HSL color codes.

export const Picker = () => {
    const [color, setColor] = useState(Token.ColorCyan400);
    return (<ColorPicker border="0.1rem solid var(--f-color-border)" radius="var(--f-radius)" p={20} color={color} onChange={setColor} footer={<View row p={10}>
                    <Text size="sm">Color Picker v0.1</Text>
                </View>}/>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<Picker />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="Picker.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Picker = () => {
    const [color, setColor] = useState(Token.ColorCyan400)

    return (
        <ColorPicker
            border="0.1rem solid var(--f-color-border)"
            radius="var(--f-radius)"
            p={20}
            color={color}
            onChange={setColor}
            footer={
                <View
                    row
                    p={10}>
                    <Text size="sm">Color Picker v0.1</Text>
                </View>
            }
        />
    )
}
```
### Color Palette

> The Color Palette component displays a list of predefined values the user can choose from.

export const ColorPalette = () => {
    const [color, setColor] = useState(Token.ColorPink400);
    return (<Palette width={150} color={color} colors={[
            Token.ColorPink400,
            Token.ColorPink400,
            Token.ColorRed400,
            Token.ColorOrange400,
            Token.ColorYellow400,
            Token.ColorGreen400,
            Token.ColorTeal500,
            Token.ColorTeal400,
            Token.ColorCyan400,
            Token.ColorBlue400,
            Token.ColorBlue400,
            Token.ColorViolet400,
            Token.ColorPurple400,
            Token.ColorGray400,
            Token.ColorStone400,
        ]} onChange={setColor}/>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<ColorPalette />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="ColorPalette.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const ColorPalette = () => {
    const [color, setColor] = useState(Token.ColorPink400)

    return (
        <Palette
            width={150}
            color={color}
            colors={[
                Token.ColorPink400,
                Token.ColorPink400,
                Token.ColorRed400,
                Token.ColorOrange400,
                Token.ColorYellow400,
                Token.ColorGreen400,
                Token.ColorTeal500,
                Token.ColorTeal400,
                Token.ColorCyan400,
                Token.ColorBlue400,
                Token.ColorBlue400,
                Token.ColorViolet400,
                Token.ColorPurple400,
                Token.ColorGray400,
                Token.ColorStone400,
            ]}
            onChange={setColor}
        />
    )
}
```

export default ({ children }) => <ComponentLayout docs={docs} props={props} css={css}>{children}</ComponentLayout>
